tit.j: みなと舞鶴ちゃったまつり

sen.j: みなと舞鶴ちゃったまつり（みなとまいづるちゃったまつり）とは、京都府舞鶴市で行われているお祭り。
sen.e: Minato Maizuru Chatta Matsuri Festival is a festival held in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Minato Maizuru Chatta Matsuri Festival is a festival held in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Minato Maizuru Chatta Matsuri Festival is a festival held in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 舞鶴地方で話される方言・舞鶴弁である「ちゃった」の名を冠したお祭りで、1975年（昭和50年）から舞鶴市や舞鶴商工会議所が主体となった「みなと舞鶴ちゃったまつり実行委員会」の主催で開催されている。
sen.e: This festival, whose name incorporates Maizuru dialect "Chatta" spoken in Maizuru Region, has been held since 1975 under the auspices of "Minato Maizuru Chatta Matsuri Festival Execution Committee" which is organized mainly by Maizuru city and the "Maizuru Chamber of Commerce and Industry."

This festival, with the name incorporating the Maizuru dialect "Chatta" spoken in the Maizuru Region, has been held since 1975 under the auspices of "Minato Maizuru Chatta Matsuri Festival Execution Committee" which is organized mainly by Maizuru City and the "Maizuru Chamber of Commerce and Industry."

This festival, with the name incorporating the Maizuru dialect "Chatta" spoken in the Maizuru Region, has been held since 1975 under the auspices of 'Minato Maizuru Chatta Matsuri Festival Execution Committee' which is organized mainly by Maizuru City and the "Maizuru Chamber of Commerce and Industry."

sen.j: 日曜日には、前島埠頭および対岸で、夜店が多数出店し盛大な盛り上がりを見せる。
sen.e: On Sunday, the festival will be charged up by many night stalls set up at Maejima wharf and its opposite shore.
On Sunday, the festival will have many night stalls set up at Maejima wharf and on its opposite shore.
On Sunday, the festival will have many night stalls set up at Maejima wharf and on its opposite shore.

sen.j: 毎年、海上自衛隊舞鶴総監部なども参加し、市街地の活性化に一役買っているほか、2004年からは舞鶴港に寄港しているロシア人船員などによる「国際連」も参加。
sen.e: Among many yearly participants of this festivity is the Maizuru Headquarters of the Maritime Self-Defense Force, playing an important role to activate the urban area of Maizuru city, as well as "Kokusai-ren (International Federation,) the organization of sailors of Russian ships calling at Maizuru Port since 2004.

Among the many yearly participants of this festivity is the Maizuru Headquarters of the Maritime Self-Defense Force, playing an important role to activate the urban area of Maizuru city, as well as "Kokusai-ren (International Federation,) the organization of sailors of Russian ships calling at Maizuru Port since 2004.

Among the many yearly participants of this festivity is the Maizuru Headquarters of the Maritime Self-Defense Force, playing an important role to activate the urban area of Maizuru city, as well as 'Kokusai-ren' (International Federation), the organization of sailors of Russian ships calling at Maizuru Port since 2004.

sen.j: 舞鶴市で年間の最大のお祭りとなっている
sen.e: This is the largest festival among many festivals held annually in Maizuru City.
This is the largest festival among many festivals held annually in Maizuru City.
This is the largest festival among many festivals held annually in Maizuru City.

sen.j: 毎年7月最終週の土・日曜日の2日間
sen.e: Two days from Saturday to Sunday of the last week of July every year
Two days from Saturday to Sunday of the last week of July every year
Two days from Saturday to Sunday of the last week of July every year

sen.j: 土曜日 - 西舞鶴市街地周辺
sen.e: On Saturday: Urban and suburban areas of Nishi-maizuru City
On Saturday: Urban and suburban areas of Nishi-maizuru City
On Saturday: Urban and suburban areas of Nishi-maizuru City
Eve of Festival
Eve of Festival
Eve of Festival
Minyo-nagashi dance events
Minyo-nagashi dance events
Minyo-nagashi dance events

sen.j: 日曜日 - 東舞鶴市街地周辺と前島埠頭・しおじプラザ
sen.e: On Sunday: Urban and suburban areas of Higashi-maizuru City, Maejima wharf and Shioji Plaza park
On Sunday: Urban and suburban areas of Higashi-maizuru City, Maejima wharf and Shioji Plaza park
On Sunday: Urban and suburban areas of Higashi-maizuru City, Maejima wharf and Shioji Plaza park

sen.j: フリーマーケット - 日中、前島埠頭一帯で開催される。
sen.e: Flea markets: take place at and around Maejima wharf during the day.
Flea markets: take place at and around Maejima wharf during the day.
Flea markets: take place at and around Maejima wharf during the day.

sen.j: 花火大会 - 約5,000発の花火。
sen.e: Display of Fireworks: about 5,000 bottle rockets to be set off
Display of Fireworks: about 5,000 bottle rockets to be set off
Display of Fireworks: about 5,000 bottle rockets to be set off

sen.j: 海上自衛隊舞鶴教育隊から舞鶴港・前島埠頭に向かって打ち上げられる花火は、周りに障害物がないため見やすく、また、水面に映る花火がその壮大さを増す。
sen.e: Display of fireworks set off from Maizuru Kyoiku-tai (Maizuru Training center) toward Maizuru Port and Maejima wharf can be easily watched from everywhere because of no hindrance around the site, with additional effects of spectackles reflected on the surface of water.

Display of fireworks set off from Maizuru Kyoiku-tai (Maizuru Training center) toward Maizuru Port and Maejima wharf can be easily watched from everywhere because there is nothing blocking the site, with additional effects of the fireworks reflected on the surface of water.

Display of fireworks set off from Maizuru Kyoiku-tai (Maizuru Training center) toward Maizuru Port and Maejima wharf can be easily watched from everywhere because there is nothing blocking the site, with additional effects of the fireworks reflected on the surface of water.
